entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
